cast.name: 坎迪达·罗亚尔 Candida Royalle

introduction: Candice, a documentary about Royalle's life and finding out what happened to her mother who left her as a child, was screened at various documentary film festivals. It was directed by Sheona McDonald and distributed by Mbur Indie Film Distribution.Now a sexagenarian, adult performer Candida Royale tells her story as a "godmother of  feminist porn," who began thirty years ago to direct films of her own focusing on women's sexual enjoyment.
